SELECT plist.plan_name as plan_name, COUNT(pp.plan_id) as allCount, SUM(if(pp.result_status = '1', 1, 0)) as allPassed, SUM(if(pp.result_status = '3', 1, 0)) as allFailed, SUM(if(pp.result_status = '2', 1, 0)) as allBlocked FROM ( SELECT plan_id, plan_name FROM plan_list WHERE plan_list.work_no = #{workNo} ) plist LEFT JOIN FTMS_PLAN_RESULT pp ON plist.plan_id = pp.plan_id GROUP BY plist.plan_id
limit #{start},#{pageSize}

SELECT count(a.plan_name) from ( SELECT plist.plan_name as plan_name FROM ( SELECT plan_id, plan_name FROM plan_list WHERE plan_list.work_no = #{workNo} ) plist LEFT JOIN FTMS_PLAN_RESULT pp ON plist.plan_id = pp.plan_id GROUP BY plist.plan_id) a
SELECT work_stage FROM work_order WHERE work_no = #{workNo}

SELECT r.RESULT_STATUS, count(*) as count FROM work_order w LEFT JOIN plan_list pl ON w.work_no = pl.work_no LEFT JOIN FTMS_PLAN_RESULT r ON pl.plan_id = r.PLAN_ID WHERE w.work_no = #{workNo} AND r.RESULT_STATUS in (0,1,2,3,4) GROUP BY r.RESULT_STATUS;
SELECT ID FROM FTMS_PLAN_RESULT WHERE PLAN_ID = #{planId}
